text: Phone Booth is a 2003 American movie about a man trapped in a telephone booth by a sniper. It stars Colin Farrell and Kiefer Sutherland and was directed by Joel Schumacher. It is set in New York City. It was originally to be released in 2002 but was delayed because of the Beltway sniper attacks. == Other websites == * Category:2003 crime movies Category:2003 thriller movies Category:2000s crime thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Joel Schumacher Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Phone Booth (movie)
